- Presenting interactive URLs in schedules customized in ARCHICAD
- Miscellaneous bug fixes

AirDrop is now supported in BIMx, making it super easy to transfer Hyper-models among any iOS or macOS devices.

Also, you have new options for sharing your Hyper-model with your friends and business partners:
- as an interactive panoramic 360 Ph

- Push notification is now supported in BIMx: get a short text message when a Hyper-model obtained from BIMx Model Transfer service has been updated and is ready to download.
- Enhanced download protocol has been introduced, making it significantly fas

- Push notification is now supported in BIMx: get a short text message when a Hyper-model obtained from BIMx Model Transfer service has been updated and is ready to download.
- Enhanced download protocol has been introduced, making it significantly fas

– Present your credits in your Hyper-model
- You, as an architect have an option to present your logo and web address in the context of the BIMx Hyper-model for your clients. These credit info will appear as part of an animation when the Hyper-model is

- Regular tips for using BIMx mobile apps.
- Schedule drawings are linked to 3D models automatically.

- Regular tips for using BIMx mobile apps.
- Schedule drawings are linked to 3D models automatically.

- Optimization for iOS 11 and iPhone X
- Miscellaneous bug fixes

- Optimization for iOS 11 and iPhone X
- Miscellaneous bug fixes

Thanks to the new presentation mode you can show clients your design in a unique, interactive way. Give them an experience to remember!
You can present anywhere, anytime, face to face or online, even on a large screen using Airplay and your iPhone or i

This update is bug fixes and stability improvements only.
